title: How to Look After a Zelf

steps.headline: Find a suitable doll brush, such as a Barbie brush.
steps.description: Depending on the size of your Zelf, you will need a brush to tame those tall, fluffy locks!

steps.headline: Learn to feed your Zelf.
steps.description: Zelfs love garden-grown vegetables and fruit! Feed your zelf, depending on what zelf they are. For example, give Marmalade goldfish crackers and Lil' some hot sauce.

steps.headline: Take the Zelf outside often.
steps.description: Zelfs are garden creatures, so they love nature. Try to show them some!

steps.headline: Make a Zelf House, or as they say, Fabitat.
steps.description: Decorate the Fabitat depending on your Zelf's personality type. For example, if your Zelf is Howlette, decorate the walls with paw prints, and if your Zelf is Spellinda, use a witch's cauldron.

steps.headline: Create a garden for your Zelf.
steps.description:
There's nothing more a Zelf loves than a good source of nature! Search in the search bar above for 'How to make a Zardenia garden'. It will help you to create your own Zardenia for your Lil' Zelfs to play in each night! {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b7\/Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg\/v4-460px-Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b7\/Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg\/v4-760px-Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

text:
Caring for the Zelf Find a suitable doll brush, such as a Barbie brush. Depending on the size of your Zelf, you will need a brush to tame those tall, fluffy locks! Learn to feed your Zelf. Zelfs love garden-grown vegetables and fruit! Feed your zelf, depending on what zelf they are. For example, give Marmalade goldfish crackers and Lil' some hot sauce. Take the Zelf outside often. Zelfs are garden creatures, so they love nature. Try to show them some! Giving the Zelf a Home Make a Zelf House, or as they say, Fabitat. Decorate the Fabitat depending on your Zelf's personality type. For example, if your Zelf is Howlette, decorate the walls with paw prints, and if your Zelf is Spellinda, use a witch's cauldron. Create a garden for your Zelf. There's nothing more a Zelf loves than a good source of nature! Search in the search bar above for 'How to make a Zardenia garden'. It will help you to create your own Zardenia for your Lil' Zelfs to play in each night! {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b7\/Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg\/v4-460px-Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b7\/Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg\/v4-760px-Look-After-a-Zelf-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"
